alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 11 at 8:00AM MST until February 11 at 8:30AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southwestern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 830 AM MST. * At 759 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located 8 miles northeast of Ellsworth Air Force Base, or 17 miles northeast of Rapid City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions. Zero visibility in snow. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 64 and 90. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, New Underwood, Curlew Lake, Rapid City Airport and Viewfield. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents.
